settings.title: Risograph Printing Services
settings.description: Discover the unique beauty of risograph printing for your next project. Our eco-friendly printing service delivers vibrant colors, texture, and character that digital printing simply can't match.

settings.title: Digital Preparation
settings.description: We prepare your design files for risograph printing, separating colors and optimizing for the best results.

settings.title: Color Separation
settings.description: Each color is printed separately in layers, creating the vibrant, overlapping colors that risograph is known for.

settings.title: Printing Process
settings.description: Our risograph printer creates a master stencil for each color, and then pushes ink through the stencil onto the paper.

settings.title: Quality Control
settings.description: We carefully check each print for quality and alignment, ensuring your final product meets our high standards.

settings.title: What We Do
settings.subtitle: Risograph printing is a unique process that combines the vibrant colors of screen printing with the efficiency of digital printing. Here's how we bring your designs to life:
settings.conclusion: The result is a beautiful, tactile print with vibrant colors and a unique aesthetic that can't be achieved with traditional digital printing.

settings.color_description: A vibrant, electric pink that adds energy to any design. Great for highlights and eye-catching elements.
A deep, bright blue that works well for both large areas and fine details. Creates a calm, professional feel.
A warm, sunny yellow that brings brightness to any design. Perfect for creating emphasis and warmth.
A fresh mint green that adds a natural, organic feel to your prints. Works well with both dark and light colors.

settings.title: Our Risograph Colors
settings.description: Our risograph printer uses soy-based inks in vibrant, unique colors. Each color has its own character and can be layered to create beautiful combinations. Here are the colors we currently offer:
settings.note: Please note that risograph colors can vary slightly between prints and may not precisely match digital previews. This is part of the unique charm of risograph printing!

settings.title: Our Printing Packages
settings.description: We offer a range of printing options to suit your project needs and budget. All prices include standard 80lb paper, but custom papers are available upon request.

settings.title: Our Work
settings.description: Browse through a selection of our risograph printing projects. From art prints to zines, business cards to wedding invitations, we love bringing unique designs to life.

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.description: Have questions about risograph printing? Find answers to common questions below, or contact us if you need more information.

settings.title: Get in Touch
settings.description: Ready to start your risograph printing project? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you with a quote within 24 hours.
